kickstart.post:
USERADD=/usr/sbin/useradd BIO_UID=404
$USERADD -c "Bio Roll User" -u $BIO_UID \ -r -d /share/bio biouser 2> /dev/null
mkdir -p /export/bio mkdir -m0755 -p /export/bio/ncbi/db mkdir -m0755 -p /export/bio/hmmer/db
echo "ALL ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: /bin/su - biouser" >> /etc/sudoers
ln -s /opt/Bio/tcoffee/html /var/www/html/t_coffee chmod a+x /opt/Bio/tcoffee/html/t_coffee4html.cgi
ln -s /opt/Bio/ncbi/network/wwwblast /var/www/html/blast mkdir -m0777 /var/www/html/blast/TmpGifs ln -s /opt/Bio/ncbi/bin/*.REAL /var/www/html/blast/ ln -s /opt/Bio/ncbi/bin/*.cgi /var/www/html/blast/ mv /var/www/html/blast/db/* /share/bio/ncbi/db/ rm -rf /var/www/html/blast/db/ ln -s /share/bio/ncbi/db/ /var/www/html/blast/ rm -rf /var/www/html/blast/data ln -s /opt/Bio/ncbi/data /var/www/html/blast mkdir -m0777 /var/www/html/blast/output/
chmod +x /var/www/html/blast/config_setup.pl /var/www/html/blast/config_setup.pl /export/bio/ncbi/db/ /var/www/html/blast/output/
chown -R biouser /export/bio
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks set appliance attr compute bio true
